downloader

Class KDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window

              • downloader.KDownloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class KDownloader
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A GUI which allows the user to download files from a specified website to a specified folder.
    Author:
    Kelsey McKenna
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
